property.name: Type
property.value: Evolution Creature

property.name: Race
property.value: Angel Command/Unknown/Hunter

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Evolution―Put on one of your Angel Commands. {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ Whenever your other Angel Commands would leave the battle zone, they stay in the battle zone instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ This creature can't attack players. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may add one of your non-evolution Commands in the battle zone to your shields face down. If you do, your opponent adds one of their Commands in the battle zone to their shields face down.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: No Rarity

property.name: Set
property.value: DMD-08 Transform Deck Set DX Oni Angel

property.name: Race
property.value: Angel Command/Unnoise

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ This creature can't attack players. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, look at the top 4 cards of your deck. You may take a card that has "Heaven's" in its name from your deck, show that card to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Then put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: No Rarity

property.name: Set
property.value: DMD-08 Transform Deck Set DX Oni Angel

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast/summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ Choose one of the following. If you have an Angel Command in the battle zone, you may choose both:: ► Choose up to 2 of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and tap them: ► Add the top card of your deck to your shields face down.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: No Rarity

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Search your deck. You may take a spell from your deck, show that spell to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Put up to 2 non-evolution light creatures that have "blocker" from your hand.
